channel.title: Square Space List of Items to Implement
channel.description:
[quote] Hi -
We are using SquareSpace for our mobile site (Momentum Template). We have a few custom tweaks we want to make for the page and would like a quote to implement the following items:
-Reduce the space between lines for single items in the mobile menu.
-Compress folders in the mobile menu (plus to expand)
-Move the Nav bar to the bottom of the screen for mobile site only
-Loop gallery (have arrow on last image to loop to the beginning of the gallery)
-Use + sign instead of info sign (i in circle)
-Remove header/header space on pages
-Keep gallery view background opaque with menus still transparent.
Please let me know if these items are possible as well as a quote for how long it would take.
Thank you,
Meghann [/quote]

item.title: Square Space List of Items to Implement
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Thanks! I will let you know what we decide.

Best

Meghann Dubie

item.title: Square Space List of Items to Implement
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

For info on how I work, prices and how long it can take, please do read carefully www.cregox.com/your-home and let me know if it's clear enough.

Most of those items are a matter of implementing CSS, very possible stuff.

The arrow on last image to loop into beginning of gallery is a script for gallery, which I'd do in jQuery. Also possible, but changing any gallery behaviour is always quite complicated, partially because squarespace is still using YUI.

Moving the nav bar could be complex, I'll only know once I try.

The only point I'm not sure what you want is "plus to expand" because you say "compress". I suppose you mean making the mobile menu disappear like it happens in other templates into a compact hamburger menu button. That also could turn to be complex and I'll have to do it to know.

So, I believe I'd spend anything between 1 hour and 3 hours, but that's just an estimate.

Ideally you'd pay me for 3 hours ( U$ 369 ) and we'd go from there.

Let me know if you want a video.

If you want me to work straight on squarespace I'd need admin access and can only offer 50% refund.

In other case you either have to implement it yourself or may need to pay extra time for me to do it.

Hope to hear from you!

Read full topic
item.source: Square Space List of Items to Implement
